About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

I am a Full Stack Web Developer seeking new opportunities. I'm knowledgeable in Python, MEAN, MERN with Redux. I embrace the challenge of thinking outside the box to develop solutions to enhance functionality and usability behind web applications. I also enjoy designing front-ends that allow for friendly user experience. My past experiences in Medical industries have helped me develop problem-solving skills, multi-tasking abilities, and attention to detail...
Education:
Coding Dojo intensive 14 weeks, full-time web development training program, gaining nearly 1000+ hours of intensive coding experience including the introduction, implementation, and iteration of various web projects over 3 full stacks.
GITC intensive 6 months program, web development course in Armenia learning various concepts and programming languages, developed many projects.

CloudVibes

Full MERN Stack

I have built an in depth full stack application for local restaurant, using Node, Express, React, Redux and MongoDB, mLab along with ES6+. Building an extensive backend API with Node.js & Express

  • Worked directly with client to access requirements, set project goals, and ensuring objectives were outlined and accomplished
  • Design and develop user interface to be implemented in the website to improve user experience for local restaurants using React and Redux
  • Extensive API testing with Postman
  • Integrated React with backend in an elegant way, created a great workflow
  • Ensured cross-browser and mobile device compatibility by making and using dynamic front-end framework with React
  • Used Redux for app state management
  • Created reducers and actions for app resources
  • Created many container components that integrated with Redux
  • Tested with the Redux Chrome extension
  • Design and architect CRUD operation for user order
Created a build script, secured keys and deployed to Heroku using Git.

DevBridge

Full MERN Stack

I have built an in depth full stack social network application using Node.js, Express, React, Redux and MongoDB along with ES6+. Building an extensive backend API with Node.js & Express

  • Built an extensive backend API with Node.js & Express
  • Protected routes/endpoints with JWT (JSON Web Tokens)
  • Extensive API testing with Postman
  • Integrated React with backend in an elegant way, created a great workflow
  • Have built frontend to work with the API
  • Used Redux for app state management
  • Created reducers and actions for app resources
  • Created many container components that integrated with Redux
  • Tested with the Redux Chrome extension
Created a build script, secured keys and deployed to Heroku using Git.

Wishlists

Django - Full Stack Python

The wishlists app allows signed-in users to create one or more wishlists. A user can add a product to their wishlist from the product detail page and manage their lists in the account section.

  • Used Session for user info
  • For database.MySQL relational database concept.
  • I have applied validation on form fields (Not using Appian default validation by selecting Required option) . Field is set as not required and I am looping back and showing error massage if user left field blank.
  • Deployed to AWS (EC2).

Weather forecast

React-Redux

This App is used for 5 days Weather Forcast, Users can type City name and see temperature, humidity, precipitation for 5 days with average number.

  • Created reducers and actions for app resources
  • Created many container components that integrated with Redux
  • Tested with the Redux Chrome extension
  • Used Redux for app state management
  • Used Weatherforecast API
  • Used GoogleMaps API
Created a build script, secured keys and deployed to Heroku using Git.
